statement.p: Out of the last 44 days, it rained 17 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{17}}{{44}}={0.38636363636364}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.38636363636364}={38.636363636364} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 38.64 .
